scripts.start: npm run server-build && npx cross-env MAX_WORKERS=7 node server/dist/index.uws.js
scripts.start:pm2: npm run server-build && npx cross-env ENV=production MAX_WORKERS=7 CLUSTER_INSTANCES=1 npm run pm2-puppeteer-ssr:uws
scripts.preview: npx cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview
scripts.preview:fastify: npx cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview:fastify
scripts.preview:uws: npx cross-env MODE=development ENV=production npm run start-preview:uws
scripts.start-preview: npx cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.ts
scripts.start-preview:fastify: npx cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.fastify.ts
scripts.start-preview:uws: npx cross-env RESET_RESOURCE=true MAX_WORKERS=7 node -r sucrase/register server/src/index.uws.ts
